characters: A woman with long brown hair wearing a brown jacket and black pants is riding a black scooter. A woman wearing a yellow coat is walking on the left side of the road.
summary: The vehicle is approaching an intersection. A woman on a black scooter suddenly appears from the right side of the road, crossing the intersection. The scooter emerges from behind a line of trees and bushes, partially obstructing the view. The woman is wearing a brown jacket and black pants. Simultaneously, a woman wearing a yellow coat is walking on the left side of the road, preparing to cross the street. The scooter's sudden appearance creates a potential ghost probing situation.
actions: The vehicle is approaching an intersection at a steady speed. The driver is likely maintaining speed to cross the intersection. The driver may need to decelerate if the scooter continues to cross the intersection without yielding.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A woman on a black scooter, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly emerging from behind trees and bushes and crossing the intersection. 2) Left side: A woman wearing a yellow coat, approximately 10 meters away, walking towards the intersection and preparing to cross the street.
